Package com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice

Interface Summary
AsyncCallbackHandler The interface that must be implemented by any daemon dealing with async RPC results.
Message The definition of the message object.
MessageHandler The message handler interface is called by the message service to process a message.
MessageProducer This interface is responsible for managing the producers used to create and submit messages to the message service.
MessageServiceManagerMBean The management interface for the message service.
NamedQueue This interface supplies access to a queue within the message service.
Producer The producer is responsible for creating and sending message for a single client.
QueueManager The QueueManager supplies access to the named queues.
RPCMessage The definition of the RPC message.
TextMessage This interface represents a text message.
 

Class Summary
MessageError This object describes a message error.
MessageHeader The message header is a class which enables the Async RPC based methods to access the properties for a message.
MessageSession The message information local
 

Exception Summary
InvalidMessageType This exception is thrown when a message is refered to incorrectly.
InvalidProperty This exception is thrown when the requested property does not exist or is of the incorrect format.
MessageServiceException This exception is the parent exception to all exceptions thrown by the messaging service.
TimeoutException This exception is thrown when an exception is generated due to timeout.
